text: Þis sind þa land gemæru to Hlincgelade.
Of lincgelade andlang ea to yttinga forda.
Of þam forde andlang stræte to tumbaldes treowe.
Of þane trewe andlang strete on þone midlestan hlaw.
Of þanne hlawe andlang stræte to seofan hlawan.
Of seofan hlawan to þan anum hlawe.
Of þan anum hlawe to bærlice crofte to þan up heafdan.
Of þan up heafdan on mær dene midde wearde to þan riþige of þan Riþie be þæra æcera heafdan to þan ealdan dic.
Andlang dices eft innan þa ea.
